DialogueDictionary.After scanning the vortex, you looked at: After scanning the vortex, you looked at me with a smile, and tears.
DialogueDictionary.\"It doesn't want to destroy us...\" you: "It doesn't want to destroy us..." you said. "It wants to create a new universe from the ashes of old".
DialogueDictionary.But The Universe was still healthy, it w: But The Universe was still healthy, it was not time to make such a bold sacrifice yet.
DialogueDictionary.Yet you let the signal out, risky as it: Yet you let the signal out, risky as it was. However, Cypress says it allowed for our reunion to happen.
DialogueDictionary.But now, the universe is dying. I can te: But now, the universe is dying. I can tell because the glitched tiles appearing, dams breaking...that means the star is going to go supernova.
DialogueDictionary.If only someone were to activate The Vor: If only someone were to activate The Vortex, we could put the universe out of its misery, and give birth to something new.
DialogueDictionary.But, here we are. Spending the rest of o: But, here we are. Spending the rest of our days together until our ship gets destroyed.
DialogueDictionary.Little blue friend, I may have just met: Little blue friend, I may have just met you, but I already see you as apart of our family.
DialogueDictionary.Your crave for knowledge is what brought: Your crave for knowledge is what brought us all together. You fit right in!
DialogueDictionary.So take a seat, get comfortable. This is: So take a seat, get comfortable. This is your new home now. We'll be here until the end of time!
DialogueDictionary.Kind traveler, you have bestowed upon me: Kind traveler, you have bestowed upon me such wonderful wisdom.
DialogueDictionary.An owl-like species hidden beneath a clo: An owl-like species hidden beneath a cloak above the plane of the Solar System...it is no wonder we Nomai have not discovered it yet.
DialogueDictionary.Is it true that The Eye of the Universe: Is it true that The Eye of the Universe is really just a tool of universal destruction? No wonder why they tried to hide it from us.
DialogueDictionary.Even then so, our curiosity would still: Even then so, our curiosity would still pull us further if we found out such a thing, no matter what risk is to come.
DialogueDictionary.After all, look at us. We crashed our Ve: After all, look at us. We crashed our Vessel into Dark Bramble. My family and friends have died to those ghastly fumes.
DialogueDictionary.And this ancient species, their technolo: And this ancient species, their technology is fascinating, especially this torch-like device you have projected onto me.
DialogueDictionary.Imagine how many other species we could: Imagine how many other species we could have talked to. This would have been a wonderful little tool to bring to The Festival!
DialogueDictionary.And that prisoner of theirs? He must hav: And that prisoner of theirs? He must have seen something in The Eye that no one else has seen.
DialogueDictionary.Fellow traveler, if you wish to enter Th: Fellow traveler, if you wish to enter The Eye, do not be as fearful as they were.
DialogueDictionary.If you wish to converse more, I would be: If you wish to converse more, I would be grateful to.
DialogueDictionary.Hello traveler, what is on your mind?: Hello traveler, what is on your mind?
DialogueDictionary.I need some help with my expedition. Can: I need some help with my expedition. Can you help me?
DialogueDictionary.Can I try getting you out of here?: Can I try getting you out of here?
I am sorry, traveler. I cannot help you. However, here is some advice.
DialogueDictionary.If you are feeling stuck on something, t: If you are feeling stuck on something, try going back into your notes and re-reading them.
DialogueDictionary.We Nomai have computerized logs on our s: We Nomai have computerized logs on our ship. Do you not have something similar?
DialogueDictionary.If you are still stuck, then I recommend: If you are still stuck, then I recommend exploring elsewhere and come back later.
DialogueDictionary.If you truly did go everywhere you could: If you truly did go everywhere you could, you probably came over some clues and did not notice.
DialogueDictionary.I hope this helps you on your expedition: I hope this helps you on your expeditions. However, I cannot help you much outside of that.
DialogueDictionary.I am sure there is a way that I can leav: I am sure there is a way that I can leave the Quantum Moon, but I am kind of growing to enjoy it.
DialogueDictionary.The clouds are peaceful, the rocks are a: The clouds are peaceful, the rocks are as beautiful as ever, I do not feel pain, hunger, thirst, or even time...
DialogueDictionary.And even then, what does it matter? I se: And even then, what does it matter? I sense the Solar System and The Universe itself are at their ends.
DialogueDictionary.All my friends and family have died, and: All my friends and family have died, and so will yours soon. Your connection to the Ash Twin Project does not benefit anyone else but you and whoever else is attached to it.
DialogueDictionary.However, maybe I will think about it, bu: However, maybe I will think about it, but I doubt I will be able to think of it before the death of your star.
DialogueDictionary.Here lies Phyllo the traitor, locked up: Here lies Phyllo the traitor, locked up in eternal solitude. Do NOT open or consequenses will be dire.
DialogueDictionary.Exit to Angler's Eye (WARNING: You will: Exit to Angler's Eye (WARNING: You will have to walk the way back here when you leave!)
DialogueDictionary.Everyone is now sound asleep in the Coma: Everyone is now sound asleep in the Coma Hall, but quietly sneaking through by holding focus isn't enough. It appears that not just noise wakes them, but also the artifact light.
DialogueDictionary.Anglerfish 101: Anglerfish are easier to: Anglerfish 101: Anglerfish are easier to not wake up if you go shipless. We think this is due to noise. If an emergency arises, ejecting yourself out of the ship will be handy.
DialogueDictionary.Anglerfish 101: To evade an anglerfish,: Anglerfish 101: To evade an anglerfish, use diagonal thrusting power. You can also avoid being chased if you stop thrusting right when you see it moving, or hear it grunt. It might just coast right past you instead of chase you.
DialogueDictionary.Originating from the mesa planet, Angler: Originating from the mesa planet, Anglerfish are some of this star system's toughest organisms. In this tank is a male Anglerfish, which are ten times smaller than a female. Males are always very hungry, and are always looking for a female to latch onto.
DialogueDictionary.Jellyfish are native to this planet, and: Jellyfish are native to this planet, and typically swim on the top layers of its subsurface ocean, while the anglerfish lurk at the bottom. They are typically peaceful, but don't touch them anywhere but the cap of their head.
DialogueDictionary.Day 70: Eureka! I've done it! I can harn: Day 70: Eureka! I've done it! I can harness the Bramble's space-bending powers using the cloaked moon's minerals! With its help, I can neutralize it and stop it from growing.
DialogueDictionary.I never knew reflection was coded into t: I never knew reflection was coded into the simulation framework. Seems like you can shine your light on a piece of ice and it will bounce off and hit the door.
DialogueDictionary.To the South Pole, take a stroll. Retrac: To the South Pole, take a stroll. Retrace your steps, to the North Pole.
DialogueDictionary.Tread the path of the lit candles. With: Tread the path of the lit candles. With wind opens the seed of bramble.
DialogueDictionary.At extremely rare conditions throughout: At extremely rare conditions throughout its infestation, the Bramble may form an eerie forest just like this one.
DialogueDictionary.Hey it's me Ernesto the simulated talkin: Hey it's me Ernesto the simulated talking anglerfish.
DialogueDictionary.Do you know the owl-like being that made: Do you know the owl-like being that made this place?
DialogueDictionary.Oh no...ANOTHER ERNESTO REFERENCE IN AN: Oh no...ANOTHER ERNESTO REFERENCE IN AN OUTER WILDS MOD!?
DialogueDictionary.An owl guy? Nope, never seen anything li: An owl guy? Nope, never seen anything like him.
DialogueDictionary.I honestly think he had nothing to do wi: I honestly think he had nothing to do with my existence here.
DialogueDictionary.Trust me, it's all hardcoded and I'm stu: Trust me, it's all hardcoded and I'm stuck in here forever. You'll never bail me out.
DialogueDictionary.It's even worse because Geswaldo is also: It's even worse because Geswaldo is also stuck in one next to me. I miss him very much.
Truly a fate worse than death.
DialogueDictionary.Hey! It's not my fault they love me so m: Hey! It's not my fault they love me so much!
DialogueDictionary.Hey it's me Geswaldo the simulated talki: Hey it's me Geswaldo the simulated talking jellyfish.
DialogueDictionary.An owl-like creature? Never seen anythin: An owl-like creature? Never seen anything like that.
DialogueDictionary.It almost seems like the purpose of our: It almost seems like the purpose of our simulated selves is just to sit here and swim in place.
DialogueDictionary.It's very cruel if you ask me, especiall: It's very cruel if you ask me, especially because Ernesto is right there and I can't reach him!
DialogueDictionary.Thank you for the kind compliment!: Thank you for the kind compliment!
DialogueDictionary.JUST KIDDING I LOVE YOU VERY MUCH: JUST KIDDING I LOVE YOU VERY MUCH
DialogueDictionary.See ya later. Say hi to Ernesto for me!: See ya later. Say hi to Ernesto for me!
DialogueDictionary.Whoa buddy, that's crossing the line! No: Whoa buddy, that's crossing the line! Not nice!
DialogueDictionary.During my time on my kind's ship, I have: During my time on my kind's ship, I have discovered a bug where the renderer changes to low-poly once you walk too far away from your lantern. Coincidentally, glitching tiles may also appear when the solar sails activate, disappearing 7 minutes later.
DialogueDictionary.Apparently, the artifact's focus ability: Apparently, the artifact's focus ability makes you slower in the simulation, and can even keep you from falling off edges! Very helpful for stealthy situations where being quiet is necessary.
DialogueDictionary.Interesting, seems like the invasive Bra: Interesting, seems like the invasive Bramble's growth starts at the North Pole...
DialogueDictionary.We know that the enemy is not of our kin: We know that the enemy is not of our kind, so we must protect our most important bases from intruders. Biometric measures shall be put in place in our most important base to prevent espionage by the enemy.
DialogueDictionary.The biometrics system is flawed, and we: The biometrics system is flawed, and we can't seem to fix it. If the enemy kills us, they can just hold one of our skulls and enter with ease!
DialogueDictionary.Turns out the three states of this plane: Turns out the three states of this planet are not just states, but a place in which many realities and timelines meet. When changing states with the stalls we built, this lab's structure looks...different. Could these be from alternate timelines?
DialogueDictionary.When exploring the lab in the planet's b: When exploring the lab in the planet's bright ice state, we found a machine meant for a mineral with special properties. Our leader requested we do not interfere with it.
DialogueDictionary.A light sensor submerged beneath the poi: A light sensor submerged beneath the poison lake state is the key to enter the lab on the thin-ice state. However, scratches from this current state somewhere behind the lab were left behind as a marker to place down an object that can open it. If this object can take photos as well as emit light, it would most certainly open it.
DialogueDictionary.We found a mysterious crack on a nearby: We found a mysterious crack on a nearby ice patch. To reach it, start walking diagonally towards the right after leaving this lab. Something with great weight would have to be on top of it to crush it.
DialogueDictionary.I THINK THEY SAW US! DESTROY IT! MOVE AL: I THINK THEY SAW US! DESTROY IT! MOVE ALL OPERATIONS TO THE VOLCANIC MOON!
DialogueDictionary.Does weight in a quantum object exist wh: Does weight in a quantum object exist when observed? According to our research, taking the picture is the most effective way to increase the weight of a quantum object. And surprisingly, you only need to do it once. That way you can get rid of the picture once it's taken and change states.
DialogueDictionary.After testing the machine, I took a stro: After testing the machine, I took a stroll on the ice, but noticed it had cracked. We ran some more tests with the machine, but oddly, the cracks only grew more severe when no one observed the crack site.
DialogueDictionary.The effects of our experiments with quan: The effects of our experiments with quantum interference seem to dissipate over time. Would it be possible to lock the properties of a quantum rock over long periods? I imagine such a method could also be used to prevent them from wandering as well.
DialogueDictionary.My children, may you forever be remember: My children, may you forever be remembered. The oldest passed on that cloaked moon. My youngest, only an infant, passed away on my kind's ship. Both died due to lack of nutrients that our kin's ship lacked.
DialogueDictionary.Day 271: Everything that I've thought of: Day 271: Everything that I've thought of, everything that I've dreamed of, it's all come to reality. Despite all the losses and sorrow, I pushed on and even pulled it off. The terraforming process is now complete, and our home is now good as new!
DialogueDictionary.If only my children and the rest of my k: If only my children and the rest of my kind were around to see this, especially my imprisoned brother. Had you left with me instead of obsessing over <![CDATA[<color=blue>that vortex</color>]]>, you would be free and back home with me.
DialogueDictionary.Day 230: Good news! Our trees are health: Day 230: Good news! Our trees are healthy and ready to be planted! The terraforming process is going smoothly now!
DialogueDictionary.FUCHSIA: Hello? Agapanthus? Ixora? Are y: FUCHSIA: Hello? Agapanthus? Ixora? Are you guys okay?
DialogueDictionary.GAILLARDIA: Did you not see the threaten: GAILLARDIA: Did you not see the threatening transmission from their vessel? An alien species seemed to have murdered them!
DialogueDictionary.FUCHSIA: Oh dear. In that case, put that: FUCHSIA: Oh dear. In that case, put that solar neighborhood into a no-warp zone. First Escall, now Agapanthus! We must not risk losing any more Nomai!
DialogueDictionary.GAILLARDIA: Does this mean we stop looki: GAILLARDIA: Does this mean we stop looking for Escall?
DialogueDictionary.FUCHSIA: Of course it does! Escall's Cla: FUCHSIA: Of course it does! Escall's Clan might as well be dead too!
DialogueDictionary.<![CDATA[<color=green>DO NOT WARP TO OUR: <![CDATA[<color=green>DO NOT WARP TO OUR SYSTEM AGAIN!</color>]]>
DialogueDictionary.<![CDATA[<color=green>IF YOU DO, YOU WIL: <![CDATA[<color=green>IF YOU DO, YOU WILL SUFFER THE SAME FATE AS THESE ALIENS HAVE!</color>]]>
DialogueDictionary.AGAPANTHUS: We have been able to get app: AGAPANTHUS: We have been able to get approximate coordinates to where Escall may have warped to.
DialogueDictionary.IXORA: Hopefully we don't \"disappear\": IXORA: Hopefully we don't "disappear" like Escall did. Are you sure looking for Escall is worth it?
DialogueDictionary.AGAPANTHUS: And leave our friends behind: AGAPANTHUS: And leave our friends behind? Never! It is definitely worth the risk. The festivals won't be the same without Escall's Clan!
DialogueDictionary.IXORA: Well, if you say so. Initiating w: IXORA: Well, if you say so. Initiating warp!
DialogueDictionary.I saw some messed up things, Slate! An a: I saw some messed up things, Slate! An alien species landed on Timber Hearth and ate our primitive ancestors! The aliens then took off for Dark Bramble before it overgrew.
DialogueDictionary.Son of a Beachum! That makes me sick to: Son of a Beachum! That makes me sick to my stomach, I'll never eat fish again!
DialogueDictionary.If I were as courageous as you, I'd go t: If I were as courageous as you, I'd go to Dark Bramble and see if they left anything behind.
DialogueDictionary.The Nomai....The Eye...this new bird spe: The Nomai....The Eye...this new bird species...
DialogueDictionary.It all makes sense now! I am going to te: It all makes sense now! I am going to tell Hornfels Right away!
...but I have to finish my lunch first. I'm starving!
DialogueDictionary.Don't bother me right now! I have a lot: Don't bother me right now! I have a lot to think about. Plus, I'm on lunch for another 30 minutes.
DialogueDictionary.Hey Hatch! I was walking past the waterf: Hey Hatch! I was walking past the waterfall just now and I heard some odd frequency I've never heard before. Think you can check it out?
DialogueDictionary.Absolutely not! I've been done with expl: Absolutely not! I've been done with exploring ever since I got my neck snapped by an owl creature!
DialogueDictionary.By the waterfall? How hasn't anyone foun: By the waterfall? How hasn't anyone found it yet?
DialogueDictionary.Thank you, Hatchling! Let me know what y: Thank you, Hatchling! Let me know what you find!
DialogueDictionary.Uh....what? I have no idea what you just: Uh....what? I have no idea what you just said but you have no need to take it out on me!
DialogueDictionary.I think it might have something to do wi: I think it might have something to do with the rush of the falls being louder than it, plus we just upgraded our signal scopes for your adventure yesterday. So will you find it for me Hatchling?

ShipLogDictionary.According to a vision I saw on Timber He: According to a vision I saw on Timber Hearth, the ship flew towards present-day Dark Bramble. Slate told me to investigate the area.
ShipLogDictionary.Angler's Eye is Dark Bramble's hidden mo: Angler's Eye is Dark Bramble's hidden moon. It has a natural cloak and several Stranger-styled homes.
ShipLogDictionary.According to a message written in the ba: According to a message written in the basement of the Bramble Museum, there is a Bramble Seed located in the South Pole, likely within the hurricane.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a hurricane on the south pole of: I found a hurricane on the south pole of Angler's Eye. It looks dangerous, so I probably shouldn't enter it.
ShipLogDictionary.I was able to enter the tornado safely w: I was able to enter the tornado safely with the Cloaked Mineral.
ShipLogDictionary.An alien language is used throughout the: An alien language is used throughout the planet that is identical the writings seen on The Stranger. If only there was some way to learn the language in less than 22 minutes...
An alien language is used throughout the planet that is identical the writings seen on The Stranger.
ShipLogDictionary.With the help of the Vision Torch, I can: With the help of the Vision Torch, I can now read the language of The Strangers' Inhabitants!
ShipLogDictionary.I found a slide reel in the locked room: I found a slide reel in the locked room in the Signal House.
ShipLogDictionary.This slide reel shows how to get to a hi: This slide reel shows how to get to a hidden area in the simulation on The Stranger. It seems to be by the balcony outside the prison entrance.
ShipLogDictionary.The slide reel shows an inhabitant using: The slide reel shows an inhabitant using a vision torch to project some sort of terraform plan. He and two other inhabitants leave The Stranger and ended up crashing by Dark Bramble.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a slide reel on the second floor: I found a slide reel on the second floor of the Research and Development House.
ShipLogDictionary.The slide reel shows an older inhabitant: The slide reel shows an older inhabitant teaching a younger one how to read with a vision torch.
ShipLogDictionary.The group of inhabitants on the slide re: The group of inhabitants on the slide reel crashed on Angler's Eye somewhere. Could there be a crash site somewhere?
ShipLogDictionary.I found a plank near the Research and De: I found a plank near the Research and Development House with some text on it.
ShipLogDictionary.The text says this is a crash site, but: The text says this is a crash site, but strangely, the ship is missing. It mentions the temperatures here are bearable, allowing the three inhabitants seen in the reels to survive for quite a while, with the help of emergency trees.
ShipLogDictionary.A signal is being emitted by some sort o: A signal is being emitted by some sort of signal tower on the north pole of Angler's Eye.
ShipLogDictionary.On the first floor of the signal house,: On the first floor of the signal house, there are several wires and a projection in the middle.
ShipLogDictionary.One of the texts on the wall reveals tha: One of the texts on the wall reveals that the purpose of this station was to locate and contact The Stranger.
ShipLogDictionary.One of the texts on the wall reads out s: One of the texts on the wall reads out some sort of poem stanza...
ShipLogDictionary.I can't get into the second floor of the: I can't get into the second floor of the Signal House! The entrance requires some sort of code for entry.
I unlocked the door to the second floor. There is a desk with a strange artifact and some writing on it.
ShipLogDictionary.The text on the second floor of the Sign: The text on the second floor of the Signal House reveals that a malfunctioning lightbulb inside the Bramble Museum synced itself up with a hidden door, which can be found with a flashlight. The closer the door is to opening, the darker the lightbulb gets.
ShipLogDictionary.A museum dedicated to Dark Bramble is se: A museum dedicated to Dark Bramble is seen near the north pole.
ShipLogDictionary.A giant, heavy boulder is blocking the s: A giant, heavy boulder is blocking the side entrance to the basement.
ShipLogDictionary.The exhibit to the left is a model of Da: The exhibit to the left is a model of Dark Bramble, both before and after the invasive Bramble Plant outgrew it.
ShipLogDictionary.The exhibit straight ahead is a model of: The exhibit straight ahead is a model of an Anglerfish. Their habitat is normally in the deep sea, but when the Bramble Plant grew, they were sent to the pocket dimensions within Dark Bramble.
ShipLogDictionary.The exhibit to the right contains the mi: The exhibit to the right contains the minerals abundant on Angler's Eye preventing a Bramble Vine from growing any further. It's the only way to halt its growth, but there are mentions of effects on the pocket dimensions within it.
ShipLogDictionary.An eerie, green fire and some beds lie i: An eerie, green fire and some beds lie in the basement of the Dark Bramble Museum.
ShipLogDictionary.According to some text, this is a simula: According to some text, this is a simulation meant to preserve the fifth planet before it became Dark Bramble. Some archived slides have also been sent there.
ShipLogDictionary.There is a Theater House on Angler's Eye: There is a Theater House on Angler's Eye for the purpose of watching slide reels.
ShipLogDictionary.The text on the left of the table reads: The text on the left of the table reads out some sort of poem stanza...
ShipLogDictionary.The text on the right of the table reads: The text on the right of the table reads out some sort of poem stanza...
ShipLogDictionary.I found a poem in one of the houses in A: I found a poem in one of the houses in Angler's Eye. It seemed unfinished.
ShipLogDictionary.The first stanza in the Research House i: The first stanza in the Research House is "For our old world to be revived, get these things and it shall thrive. There is an order it shall follow, or it will stay dead and hollow. First things first, go get a seed. Then search elsewhere for the rest you need".
ShipLogDictionary.The second stanza in the Conservatory is: The second stanza in the Conservatory is "Next you shall let the water flow, only then will our trees regrow. Obtain the water above the sky, from the Ringed Giant way up high".
ShipLogDictionary.The third stanza in the Theater House is: The third stanza in the Theater House is "With those two things, fresh air will flourish, so plants and animals can thrive and nourish".
ShipLogDictionary.The fourth stanza in the Theater House i: The fourth stanza in the Theater House is "The seeds grow best on sunny days, our air lets fires set ablaze".
ShipLogDictionary.The fifth stanza in the Bramble Museum i: The fifth stanza in the Bramble Museum is "Fourth, keep out a watchful eye. Make sure our offspring does not die".
ShipLogDictionary.The sixth and final stanza in the Signal: The sixth and final stanza in the Signal House is "Input these poems as a secret code, but put a star in the fifth node".
ShipLogDictionary.The Conservatory building consists of a: The Conservatory building consists of a few empty fish tanks and a handful of trees.
ShipLogDictionary.There is a mineral at the bottom of the: There is a mineral at the bottom of the mines that can be picked up.
ShipLogDictionary.Just like I saw on the Timber Hearth sli: Just like I saw on the Timber Hearth slide reel, the inhabitants on this planet survived off of eating primitive Hearthians.
ShipLogDictionary.According to a message written on the Co: According to a message written on the Conservatory's desk, they found out about the Hearthian future, and knew that I would come here.
ShipLogDictionary.According to a message on the second flo: According to a message on the second floor, the purpose of the Conservatory is meant to produce healthy seeds for the terraform plan.
ShipLogDictionary.There is a mining hole not far from the: There is a mining hole not far from the south pole. A pickaxe and several rocks are seen there.
ShipLogDictionary.The text at the bottom of the hole says: The text at the bottom of the hole says that it was to get resources for The Stranger's cloaking device. It can also be used as fuel.
ShipLogDictionary.A picture on the first floor's table sho: A picture on the first floor's table shows the home moon of the Stranger's Inhabitants. The Stranger is X'd out, and other icons are sketched out.
ShipLogDictionary.A picture on the second floor shows the: A picture on the second floor shows the orbit of Angler's Eye.
ShipLogDictionary.50 days after arriving, the author of th: 50 days after arriving, the author of the writing returned to The Stranger.
ShipLogDictionary.Disturbed at what they found, this inhab: Disturbed at what they found, this inhabitant returned to Angler's Eye after finding their kind dead, trapped in the simulation.
ShipLogDictionary.To the left of the picture, the text say: To the left of the picture, the text says that the picture was a plan to terraform their home moon, and that doing so isn't impossible.
ShipLogDictionary.To the right of the picture, the text sa: To the right of the picture, the text says that for whatever reason, The Stranger cannot be used. Water can be extracted from the Teal-Ringed Giant, and trees and transport are necessary.
ShipLogDictionary.Angler's Eye is in orbit around Dark Bra: Angler's Eye is in orbit around Dark Bramble. The Nomai must have never found it because they were too afraid of Dark Bramble.
ShipLogDictionary.The minerals on Angler's Eye were used t: The minerals on Angler's Eye were used to gain resources for The Stranger.
ShipLogDictionary.Most of this settlement is located on th: Most of this settlement is located on the north pole. It's possible to enter the south pole hurricane in some way.
ShipLogDictionary.70 days after arriving, this inhabitant: 70 days after arriving, this inhabitant discovered that Angler's Eye may have originated from a collision with The Eye, and orbits both it and Dark Bramble. Due to its incredibly slow orbit, it's best I find some other way of reaching The Eye.
ShipLogDictionary.The text on the second floor desk reads: The text on the second floor desk reads out some sort of poem stanza...
ShipLogDictionary.I found a mysterious area with torches,: I found a mysterious area with torches, a starfield, and a ominous teal light in the center.
ShipLogDictionary.The teal-lighted pedestal warps me betwe: The teal-lighted pedestal warps me between the Preserved Planet and the Simulation on the Stranger.
ShipLogDictionary.The code door straight ahead has an embl: The code door straight ahead has an emblem with a large amount of Bramble Vines growing from a center point.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a new simulation built to preser: I found a new simulation built to preserve the life of Dark Bramble's former self.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a cave system beneath the Preser: I found a cave system beneath the Preserved Planet's Crust. There's water below, so I should probably watch my step.
ShipLogDictionary.A vine from the Bramble Seed blocking th: A vine from the Bramble Seed blocking the ocean also appears to be reaching out and blocking something.
ShipLogDictionary.On the South Pole in the caves is a sign: On the South Pole in the caves is a sign. It says a poem "To the South Pole, take a stroll. Retrace your steps, to the North Pole."
ShipLogDictionary.There is a mysterious house to the left: There is a mysterious house to the left of the green campfire. Each gateway has a unique emblem.
ShipLogDictionary.The door on the left warps me to the Bra: The door on the left warps me to the Bramble Forest.
ShipLogDictionary.The door straight ahead warps me to the: The door straight ahead warps me to the North Pole.
ShipLogDictionary.The door to the right warps me underneat: The door to the right warps me underneath the planet's crust.
ShipLogDictionary.Entering the nook on the other side warp: Entering the nook on the other side warps me back to the South Pole.
ShipLogDictionary.There's a house with three projectors in: There's a house with three projectors inside. I can't seem to get in.
ShipLogDictionary.I was able to get inside by reflecting l: I was able to get inside by reflecting light off of an ice shard from the window!
ShipLogDictionary.The projection on the left shows me an e: The projection on the left shows me an exploit about The Artifact.
ShipLogDictionary.The text on the left explains how to per: The text on the left explains how to perform an exploit, which involves walking away from The Artifact. Glitched tiles might also appear when the solar sails activate, but deactivates 7 minutes later.
ShipLogDictionary.The projection in the middle shows The A: The projection in the middle shows The Artifact repeatedly toggling its focus.
ShipLogDictionary.The text in the middle reveals that usin: The text in the middle reveals that using focus in the simulation can cause you to sneak, and even prevent from falling off edges. This will help me in cautious scenarios, and stealthy scenarios where one would need to be quiet.
ShipLogDictionary.The projection on the right shows how Da: The projection on the right shows how Dark Bramble outgrew the frozen planet that was once there.
ShipLogDictionary.The text on the right points out that th: The text on the right points out that the Bramble Plant started its growth from the North Pole
ShipLogDictionary.I found a tank containing an Anglerfish: I found a tank containing an Anglerfish and a Jellyfish.
ShipLogDictionary.The observations made by the inhabitants: The observations made by the inhabitants reveal that Anglerfish were once part of Ember Twin, and that the small ones are typically males looking for mates. No wonder why it latched onto one of our ships!
ShipLogDictionary.It also appears that Jellyfish are actua: It also appears that Jellyfish are actually native to the frozen planet that became Dark Bramble, and eventually both species lived together in its subsurface ocean.
ShipLogDictionary.There is a building north of the forest: There is a building north of the forest that I can't seem to get into. There has to be another way!
ShipLogDictionary.I made it into the lab with the Bramble: I made it into the lab with the Bramble Seed in the Bramble Forest!
ShipLogDictionary.The inhabitant who left this place behin: The inhabitant who left this place behind discovered the Angler's Eye minerals to stop the Bramble from growing!
ShipLogDictionary.I discovered I can reflect my artifact l: I discovered I can reflect my artifact light off of ice shards!
I found a forest made of Bramble Vines.
ShipLogDictionary.There is a Bramble Node that appears to: There is a Bramble Node that appears to be blocked.
ShipLogDictionary.It appears that this forest is preservin: It appears that this forest is preserving some awkward stage in the infestation of the Bramble Plant where the vines formed forest biomes such as these.
ShipLogDictionary.A poem is written on one of the signs in: A poem is written on one of the signs in the forest. "Tread the path of the lit candles. With wind opens the seed of bramble."
ShipLogDictionary.There is what appears to be a Bramble In: There is what appears to be a Bramble Infestation on the North Pole.
ShipLogDictionary.There is an elevator on the edge of the: There is an elevator on the edge of the North Pole.
ShipLogDictionary.Growing atop the planet's North Pole at: Growing atop the planet's North Pole at the bottom of the ocean was a Bramble Node, and within that node are this area's archives!
ShipLogDictionary.The Scientist mentioned the fact that me: The Scientist mentioned the fact that members of his kind are asleep in a "Coma Hall", and that both noise and artifact light disturb their slumber.
ShipLogDictionary.Some advice for evading Anglerfish is wr: Some advice for evading Anglerfish is written on the wall! "Anglerfish are easier to not wake up if you go shipless. We think this is due to noise. If an emergency arises, ejecting yourself out of the ship will be handy."

Some advice for evading Anglerfish is written on the wall! "To evade an anglerfish, use diagonal thrusting power. You can also avoid being chased if you stop thrusting right when you see it moving, or hear it grunt. It might just cast right past you instead of chase you."
ShipLogDictionary.This slide reel shows The Scientist usin: This slide reel shows The Scientist using a Vision Telescope to unravel the mysteries of the frozen planet, only for him to find out that it would become Dark Bramble. However, this vision gave him an idea...
ShipLogDictionary.According to a message in the basement o: According to a message in the basement of the Dark Bramble Museum, there's a Bramble Seed planted likely inside the hurricane.
ShipLogDictionary.The dimensions connected to the Angler's: The dimensions connected to the Angler's Eye Bramble Seed are similar to Dark Bramble, but incredibly dark.
ShipLogDictionary.A strange signal similar to that of the: A strange signal similar to that of the Signal House can be heard from the South Pole of Angler's Eye.
ShipLogDictionary.The source of the strange signal is from: The source of the strange signal is from a base inside the Bramble Seed!
ShipLogDictionary.There appears to be a map showing the Br: There appears to be a map showing the Bramble Dimensions. It seems that they may connect to the Ringed Giant in the Strangers' Home System.
ShipLogDictionary.The text to the left of the map warns no: The text to the left of the map warns not to go into the light, but to instead use it as guidance.
ShipLogDictionary.The text to the right of the map says th: The text to the right of the map says that Anglerfish in these dimensions are quantum! Yikes!
ShipLogDictionary.The text to on the table says that they: The text to on the table says that they were able to feel their way through with the Vision Torch.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a slide reel inside the Bramble: I found a slide reel inside the Bramble Base.
ShipLogDictionary.The slide reel shows me instructions on: The slide reel shows me instructions on how to navigate the dimensions ahead.
ShipLogDictionary.On the Strangers' Homeworld, I can see a: On the Strangers' Homeworld, I can see a crimson gas giant orbitng the host star.
ShipLogDictionary.Velvet Vortex is the third planet in the: Velvet Vortex is the third planet in the Strangers' Home System. It has tornadoes like Giant's Deep, but the ocean is not safe to swim in.
ShipLogDictionary.According to Twig, the head of the Inhab: According to Twig, the head of the Inhabitants' Space Program, there are other travelers, each carrying a signal. I hear one coming from the crimson gas giant.
ShipLogDictionary.I met a travelling inhabitant named Pine: I met a travelling inhabitant named Pine!
ShipLogDictionary.Pine said there was a base somewhere on: Pine said there was a base somewhere on Velvet Vortex.
ShipLogDictionary.There is a base on the edge of one of th: There is a base on the edge of one of the islands in Velvet Vortex.
ShipLogDictionary.The inhabitants that wrote this say they: The inhabitants that wrote this say they were ordered to obtain electricity from the oceans for weaponry. They also doubt they were in danger at all.
ShipLogDictionary.One inhabitant suggests that the threat: One inhabitant suggests that the threat is classified to prevent panic.
ShipLogDictionary.The text on the bottom of the base says: The text on the bottom of the base says you can use the Cloaked Mineral to go under the electric fluid without getting hurt, and also be able to set it down and walk away from it a decent amount of meters.
I can't get up past the giant wall.
ShipLogDictionary.I made it past the giant wall with the a: I made it past the giant wall with the aid of a tornado.
ShipLogDictionary.This elevator lowers down to the bottom: This elevator lowers down to the bottom of the ocean.
ShipLogDictionary.On the Ringed Giant, I saw an abandoned: On the Ringed Giant, I saw an abandoned structure. On one of the slots it had a picture of a crimson gas giant.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a square piece of metal under th: I found a square piece of metal under the ocean. It looks like it fits in the structure...
ShipLogDictionary.When I put the seal in the structure, it: When I put the seal in the structure, it gave me a symbol.
ShipLogDictionary.Pine said he had a camp elsewhere in Vel: Pine said he had a camp elsewhere in Velvet Vortex.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a campsite on one of the islands: I found a campsite on one of the islands.
ShipLogDictionary.Pine said there was a lab near his camp: Pine said there was a lab near his camp on Velvet Vortex.
ShipLogDictionary.There is a spinning laboratory on the is: There is a spinning laboratory on the island next to Pine's Camp on Velvet Vortex. It has a biometric security measure at the front.
ShipLogDictionary.I cracked into the biometrics system by: I cracked into the biometrics system by using Bark's dead skull.
ShipLogDictionary.The Strangers' Inhabitants saw The Vesse: The Strangers' Inhabitants saw The Vessel warp into their home system. Feeling threatened, they were not afraid to call The Nomai their enemy.
ShipLogDictionary.After quickly gathering reconnisance, th: After quickly gathering reconnisance, they became well aware that The Vessel was unarmed. Despite the Nomai coming in peace, The Strangers' Inhabitants proceeded with their attack plan.
ShipLogDictionary.Some text claims that if the attack is s: Some text claims that if the attack is successful, they will put a cloak around The Vessel so no others could find it.
ShipLogDictionary.A set of text by the gear interface stat: A set of text by the gear interface states that to find The Vessel, you have to turn on the signal with the interface and follow the signal.
ShipLogDictionary.On the Strangers' Homeworld, I can see a: On the Strangers' Homeworld, I can see a desert planet orbitng the host star.
ShipLogDictionary.Sizzling Sands is the first planet in th: Sizzling Sands is the first planet in the Strangers' Home System. It's a tidally locked desert.
ShipLogDictionary.23 minutes into the loop, Sizzling Sands: 23 minutes into the loop, Sizzling Sands can no longer handle the growing sun and loses its atmosphere.
ShipLogDictionary.According to Twig, the head of the Inhab: According to Twig, the head of the Inhabitants' Space Program, there are other travelers, each carrying a signal. I hear one coming from the desert planet.
ShipLogDictionary.I met a travelling inhabitant named Arca: I met a travelling inhabitant named Arcadia!
ShipLogDictionary.Arcadia says there's nothing much to do: Arcadia says there's nothing much to do on Sizzling Sands, but that the sun-facing side is fatal to those who enter.
ShipLogDictionary.I've heard that the sun-facing side is f: I've heard that the sun-facing side is fatal to those who enter.
ShipLogDictionary.The sun-facing side will kill me if I en: The sun-facing side will kill me if I enter it. Is there even a safe way to walk there on foot?
ShipLogDictionary.Once the atmosphere burns out in 23 minu: Once the atmosphere burns out in 23 minutes, I can now safely walk the sun-facing side without dying!
ShipLogDictionary.On the Ringed Giant, I saw an abandoned: On the Ringed Giant, I saw an abandoned structure. On one of the slots it had a picture of a desert planet.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a square piece of metal on the s: I found a square piece of metal on the sun-side of Sizzling Sands. It looks like it fits in the structure...
ShipLogDictionary.If the Scientist's terraform is complete: If the Scientist's terraform is complete and I made it to the Ringed Giant, The Strangers' Home Moon is not far off!
ShipLogDictionary.I found the Homeworld of the Strangers I: I found the Homeworld of the Strangers Inhabitants!
ShipLogDictionary.I used The Vessel to warp to The Strange: I used The Vessel to warp to The Stranger System! Now let's end this!
ShipLogDictionary.I see a building similar to the \"Party: I see a building similar to the "Party House" in the Simulation.
ShipLogDictionary.Inside the house are a bunch of high-ran: Inside the house are a bunch of high-ranking inhabitants, and what appears to be a leader sitting in a chair.
ShipLogDictionary.A vision torch appears to be hung right: A vision torch appears to be hung right next to the Leader.
ShipLogDictionary.I see a building similar to the Cinder I: I see a building similar to the Cinder Isles Tower on The Stranger.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a memorial with the Eye Symbol a: I found a memorial with the Eye Symbol and an Artifact.
ShipLogDictionary.It says here that this memorial is dedic: It says here that this memorial is dedicated to all those who died on The Stranger.
ShipLogDictionary.A memorial for The Prisoner explains som: A memorial for The Prisoner explains some more details about why he did what he did.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a memorial upstairs with four co: I found a memorial upstairs with four containers of ashes.
ShipLogDictionary.The memorial updstairs is dedicated to T: The memorial updstairs is dedicated to The Scientist and his family. His last words were, "Keep our home safe, by any means necessary".
ShipLogDictionary.I found an observation deck similar to t: I found an observation deck similar to the one on Angler's Eye.
ShipLogDictionary.I met an inhabitant astronomer. He seems: I met an inhabitant astronomer. He seems pretty content about the world dying.
ShipLogDictionary.Some observations show that the Desert P: Some observations show that the Desert Planet is deadly on its sun-facing side and a shows the fourth planet is known to "change appearance".
ShipLogDictionary.Some observations show that there is a b: Some observations show that there is a base on the volcanic moon.
ShipLogDictionary.I tried to speak to the leader, but they: I tried to speak to the leader, but they told me to go back home. What now?
ShipLogDictionary.I told the leader everything I know with: I told the leader everything I know with a Vision Torch!
ShipLogDictionary.The leader's name is Cypress and he's a: The leader's name is Cypress and he's a distant descendant of The Scientist.
ShipLogDictionary.I was able to convince Cypress to come w: I was able to convince Cypress to come with me aboard The Vessel! Let's get going!
ShipLogDictionary.I see a giant building with three inhabi: I see a giant building with three inhabitant ships on its ceiling.
I found what looks to be a Space Center.
ShipLogDictionary.I met an inhabitant named Twig, who runs: I met an inhabitant named Twig, who runs his kind's space program!
ShipLogDictionary.Twig's mission is to send out a probe in: Twig's mission is to send out a probe into the dying universe.
ShipLogDictionary.Twig said the best way to explore the sy: Twig said the best way to explore the system is to reach out to the other travelers.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a statue of The Scientist outsid: I found a statue of The Scientist outside a taller-looking version of the Bramble Museum on Angler's Eye. Looks like it was built in his honor.
ShipLogDictionary.The statue was built in honor of The Sci: The statue was built in honor of The Scientist. If it wasn't for him, this planet would still just be a ball of dirt.
ShipLogDictionary.The exhibit to the left is a model of Da: The exhibit to the left is a model of Dark Bramble, both before and after the invasive Bramble Plant outgrew it. The text appears to be updated now that Dark Bramble is overgrown.
ShipLogDictionary.The exhibit straight ahead is a model of: The exhibit straight ahead is a model of an Anglerfish. The text has changed to glorify The Scientist's victory.
ShipLogDictionary.The exhibit to the right contains the mi: The exhibit to the right contains the minerals abundant on Angler's Eye preventing a Bramble Vine from growing any further. The text boasts about The Scientist using it to make it back to his homeworld.
ShipLogDictionary.An extra exhibit downstairs has one of t: An extra exhibit downstairs has one of those Cloak Minerals on display.
ShipLogDictionary.A model of the star system is in the bas: A model of the star system is in the basement of the museum. There are four planets, just like the slide reels have shown. Some text also provides details on the system.
ShipLogDictionary.According to a slide reel I found inside: According to a slide reel I found inside the Signal House on Angler's Eye, there is a secret path near the peephole in the fourth sector of the simulation.
ShipLogDictionary.There is a fourth sector in the simulati: There is a fourth sector in the simulation I have never noticed before. It has a few houses built on top of the lake.
ShipLogDictionary.I saw some glitched tiles wrapping aroun: I saw some glitched tiles wrapping around the buildings in the area.
ShipLogDictionary.In the new simulation area, there is a f: In the new simulation area, there is a fixed-up version of the Research and Development House on Angler's Eye.
ShipLogDictionary.This new area was coded in by the Scient: This new area was coded in by the Scientist on Angler's Eye when he visited The Stranger.
ShipLogDictionary.The Scientist did not feel comfortable a: The Scientist did not feel comfortable about the simulation's life preserving abilities.
ShipLogDictionary.According to the Scientist, his kind wer: According to the Scientist, his kind were still homesick in the simulation of their homeland and realized the only thing he could do to help was to put them in a permanant coma.
ShipLogDictionary.A memorial dedicated to The Scientist an: A memorial dedicated to The Scientist and his family are on the second floor. Both his children died by lack of nutrients from The Stranger.
ShipLogDictionary.In the new simulation area, there is a f: In the new simulation area, there is a fixed-up version of the Theater House on Angler's Eye.
ShipLogDictionary.A thief stole some of the slides to burn: A thief stole some of the slides to burn them! According to the text I found in the Theater House, he ran to the left after running out the front door.
ShipLogDictionary.I went to the left of the entrance and I: I went to the left of the entrance and I see nothing there... Something's not right.
ShipLogDictionary.The slide reel shows that there is an un: The slide reel shows that there is an underwater bridge to get to the house on the far left.
ShipLogDictionary.Text in the Research and Development Bui: Text in the Research and Development Building in the Isolated Swamp says a "Coma Hall" was built.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a long hallway with several stra: I found a long hallway with several strangers sleeping, with an elevator at the end. I was wondering where the rest went!
ShipLogDictionary.In the Bramble Archives, a note by The S: In the Bramble Archives, a note by The Scientist warns that any use of light in the "Coma Hall" can wake up those sleeping in it.
ShipLogDictionary.The elevator at the end of the hall take: The elevator at the end of the hall takes me down to another forbidden archive!
ShipLogDictionary.In the archive, the elevator to the left: In the archive, the elevator to the left takes me to a library filled with slide reels involving the history of the inhabitants.
ShipLogDictionary.In the archive, the elevator in the midd: In the archive, the elevator in the middle takes me to a library filled with slide reels filled with information.
ShipLogDictionary.In the archive, the elevator to the righ: In the archive, the elevator to the right takes me down to the theater. It also contains a table and some data transferring totems.
ShipLogDictionary.Accroding to a message on the table, The: Accroding to a message on the table, The Scientist made this archive to preserve all the slide reels, but this "leader" ordered him to have it guarded.

Accroding to a message on the table, The Scientist explains how the coma hall works, but also brings up how popular it was. This explains where all the others went that I haven't seen in the other areas.
ShipLogDictionary.This slide reel shows The Prisoner among: This slide reel shows The Prisoner among others breaking down in tears after watching The Scientist crash into Angler's Eye. The Prisoner almost jumped off the Eye Shrine, but seeing The Eye Symbol sparked something in him to stop...
ShipLogDictionary.I met a data clone of The Scientist in t: I met a data clone of The Scientist in the Isolated Swamp Archives!
ShipLogDictionary.An inhabitant in the Archives used the V: An inhabitant in the Archives used the Vision Torch to learn my language.
ShipLogDictionary.This is a data clone of The Scientist be: This is a data clone of The Scientist before he left The Stranger, so he has no idea about what happened to him afterwards.
ShipLogDictionary.The Scientist was the head of the scient: The Scientist was the head of the scientific committee, and even invented the Vision Torch and discovered green fire technology. Against his will, he was forced to help destroy the planet. He also would have never approved of the simulation if he was still on the ship at that time.
ShipLogDictionary.The Scientist explains more about his fa: The Scientist explains more about his family and how they died due to poor enviromnmental factors on The Stranger.
ShipLogDictionary.The Scientist describes life before his: The Scientist describes life before his kind found The Eye. They were connected with nature, were very spiritual, and lived in happiness under the Ringed Giant. It was their superstition which caused them to destroy their home planet, just to reach The Eye. He also mentions that all animals from their old planet went extinct faster than they could preserve them.
ShipLogDictionary.The Scientist got very uncomfortable whe: The Scientist got very uncomfortable when I brought up The Prisoner, but he did tell me that some of them miss him deep down. The Scientist also thinks it was too early for The Eye's signal to be let out.
ShipLogDictionary.The Scientist explained how terrifying l: The Scientist explained how terrifying life was on The Stranger. Many Strangers got so insane, they took their own lives. And if not, they starved to death due to lack of food. There were 55 crew members. 20 died, and 33 more got trapped in the simulation.
ShipLogDictionary.The Scientist also explains cloaked tech: The Scientist also explains cloaked techonolgy. It can work on your ship without any customizations.
ShipLogDictionary.The Scientist describes leadership of hi: The Scientist describes leadership of his kind. It's made up of a council, but one leader ends up being more powerful than others. The leader they had was a tyrant, leaving people who refused to board The Stranger at home to die.
ShipLogDictionary.The Scientist tells me more about Angler: The Scientist tells me more about Angler's Eye. When travelling to check on their home moon, The Scientist and his family crashed into it because they miscalculated its orbit, which actually orbited both Dark Bramble and The Eye. It's also an "evil twin" of the Quantum Moon. The Scientist also mentions that the mineral on Angler's Eye will get you through the Hurricane unharmed.
ShipLogDictionary.I've heard rumors of a fourth planet wit: I've heard rumors of a fourth planet with a transforming surface.
ShipLogDictionary.The Distant Enigma is the fourth planet: The Distant Enigma is the fourth planet of the Strangers' Homeworld.
ShipLogDictionary.Bark hinted that this planet is quantum,: Bark hinted that this planet is quantum, and has three states.
ShipLogDictionary.The first state has hard, dark ice, but: The first state has hard, dark ice, but seem to have some dents in them.
ShipLogDictionary.The second state has lakes of poisonous: The second state has lakes of poisonous water.
The third state has thin, bright ice.
ShipLogDictionary.According to Twig, the head of the Inhab: According to Twig, the head of the Inhabitants' Space Program, there are other travelers, each carrying a signal. I sometimes hear one coming from the distance, of what could be a fourth planet.
ShipLogDictionary.I met a travelling inhabitant named Bark: I met a travelling inhabitant named Bark, but he's only alive on the first state.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a lab on Distant Enigma's First: I found a lab on Distant Enigma's First State.
ShipLogDictionary.Studies show that quantum bodies like th: Studies show that quantum bodies like this one are a collision of separate timelines. They also mention the lab changes each state.
ShipLogDictionary.On the third state, they have discovered: On the third state, they have discovered a machine meant for a special mineral.
ShipLogDictionary.Shown on a picture on one of the tables: Shown on a picture on one of the tables is a scratch on the ice of the current state. They say it marks the location of a light sensor submerged in the poison state, which is marked somewhere behind the thick-ice state's lab. It will likely open if an object that can both emit light and take pictures is placed down.
Shown on a picture on one of the tables is a crack on the ice of the current state. It can be found on the patch of ice to the right of the lab, and might need something to break its weight.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a lab on Distant Enigma's Second: I found a lab on Distant Enigma's Second State....but it's all broken.
ShipLogDictionary.It seems the lab was broken and all oper: It seems the lab was broken and all operations in it were moved to the volcanic moon.
ShipLogDictionary.According to some text I saw lying near: According to some text I saw lying near the shores of the second state, research has proven photography the most effective way to increase the weight of a quantum object. It also states you only need to take a picture once, so you can remove the picture and change states once taken.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a lab on Distant Enigma's Third: I found a lab on Distant Enigma's Third State, but it seems blocked...
ShipLogDictionary.I made my way into the blocked lab with: I made my way into the blocked lab with the door interface hidden beneath the liquid on the second state! Behind the door is an odd machine...
ShipLogDictionary.Studies show that something natural on t: Studies show that something natural on the planet once caused the ice on this state to break.
ShipLogDictionary.Some text next to the machine explains i: Some text next to the machine explains its capabilities of weakening quantum objects. This decreases their range, which causes their weight to increase.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a base on Distant Enigma's First: I found a base on Distant Enigma's First State. It doesn't seem to appear on the second or third states.
ShipLogDictionary.The Strangers' Inhabitants set up a biom: The Strangers' Inhabitants set up a biometric authentication system somewhere to prevent alien espionage.
ShipLogDictionary.The biometrics are flawed, and will let: The biometrics are flawed, and will let you in if you hold the skull of an Inhabitant.
ShipLogDictionary.On the Ringed Giant, I saw an abandoned: On the Ringed Giant, I saw an abandoned structure. On one of the slots it had a picture of a rocky, magenta planet. Could this be the fourth planet?
ShipLogDictionary.I found a square piece of metal under th: I found a square piece of metal under the ice of the third state. It looks like it fits in the structure...
ShipLogDictionary.A few inhabitant-sized stalls are found: A few inhabitant-sized stalls are found throughout Distant Enigma. What is their purpose?
ShipLogDictionary.The stalls change the state of Distant E: The stalls change the state of Distant Enigma!
ShipLogDictionary.There's a light sensor that will open th: There's a light sensor that will open the way to the lab on the thin-ice state. I need to use something that emits light and takes pictures.
ShipLogDictionary.I found an interface with my scout using: I found an interface with my scout using the scratch marks and changing states.
ShipLogDictionary.There's a picture showing cracks on the: There's a picture showing cracks on the dark-ice state. Some text says it's diagonally to the right of the lab from where you exit.
ShipLogDictionary.Bark says he found the crack by his ship: Bark says he found the crack by his ship near the lab.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a crack on Distant Enigma's firs: I found a crack on Distant Enigma's first state, by Bark's Ship.
ShipLogDictionary.There's a picture showing a scratch mark: There's a picture showing a scratch mark on the dark-ice state. Some text says it's directly behind the lab somewhere.
ShipLogDictionary.Bark says he saw the scratch about 120 m: Bark says he saw the scratch about 120 meters south of the lab, situated next to a lantern.
ShipLogDictionary.I found scratch marks on Distant Enigma': I found scratch marks on Distant Enigma's first state.
ShipLogDictionary.I've finally seen the Ringed Giant in al: I've finally seen the Ringed Giant in all its glory first-hand! Now is there anything beneath the clouds?
ShipLogDictionary.Beneath the clouds of the Ringed Giant i: Beneath the clouds of the Ringed Giant is a ocean of mostly pure water, and two islands. The islands seem tall because The Scientist must have drained a bit of the water for terraforming.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a mysterious structure on one of: I found a mysterious structure on one of the islands. It seems to have five sockets, with pictures of all the planets on each of them.
ShipLogDictionary.According to Twig, the head of the Inhab: According to Twig, the head of the Inhabitants' Space Program, there are other travelers, each carrying a signal. I hear one coming from the Ringed Giant.
ShipLogDictionary.I met a travelling inhabitant named Bush: I met a travelling inhabitant named Bush!
ShipLogDictionary.Bush says there's not much else to do he: Bush says there's not much else to do here other than find the campground.
ShipLogDictionary.Bush said he had a camp elsewhere on the: Bush said he had a camp elsewhere on the Ringed Giant.
ShipLogDictionary.On the Ringed Giant, I saw an abandoned: On the Ringed Giant, I saw an abandoned structure. On one of the slots it had a picture of the Ringed Giant.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a square piece of metal at Bush': I found a square piece of metal at Bush's Campsite. It looks like it fits in the structure...
ShipLogDictionary.I have entered a mysterious structure le: I have entered a mysterious structure left by The Scientist.
ShipLogDictionary.This laboratory is orbiting around the R: This laboratory is orbiting around the Ringed Giant! It must be a station used for terraforming!
ShipLogDictionary.There is a room with a single tree in it: There is a room with a single tree in it.
ShipLogDictionary.A piece of text on the wall says the tre: A piece of text on the wall says the trees are healthy and are ready to be planted.
ShipLogDictionary.The text near the tree says that The Sci: The text near the tree says that The Scientist's terraforming plan is going smoothly.
ShipLogDictionary.There is a room with the same terraform: There is a room with the same terraform plan I saw way back on Angler's Eye, but it seems more completed.
ShipLogDictionary.A piece of text on the table says The Sc: A piece of text on the table says The Scientist completed his terraform plan!
ShipLogDictionary.A piece of text on the table reveals The: A piece of text on the table reveals The Scientist and The Prisoner are brothers!
ShipLogDictionary.There is a beaten up Nomai Vessel on the: There is a beaten up Nomai Vessel on the outskirts of this star system.
ShipLogDictionary.On the Vessel's incoming message board,: On the Vessel's incoming message board, other Nomai clans try to check in with this Vessel's clan. Due to a threatening message, the Nomai placed a no-warp zone around our solar neighborhood!
ShipLogDictionary.On the Vessel's outgoing message board,: On the Vessel's outgoing message board, there is some poorly written Nomai message. The message threatens Nomai and other travelers not to warp to this system.
ShipLogDictionary.According to a vision I saw on the Stran: According to a vision I saw on the Stranded Vessel, the Strangers burnt all the Nomai in the Vessel alive! They also wrote that outgoing threat message with the vision torch and one of the Nomai staffs.
ShipLogDictionary.The Stranded Vessel's hologram shows a s: The Stranded Vessel's hologram shows a set of coordinates.
ShipLogDictionary.According to a Nomai recording, the coor: According to a Nomai recording, the coordinates displayed are the coordinates used to warp here. Apparently, these coordinates were supposed to be a rough esitmate of Escall's location.
ShipLogDictionary.Slate said the strange signal came from: Slate said the strange signal came from one of the waterfalls in the village.
ShipLogDictionary.The strange signal appears to be coming: The strange signal appears to be coming from a Vision Torch.
ShipLogDictionary.The vision torch contained a vision of t: The vision torch contained a vision of three inhabitants of the Stranger landing on Timber Hearth where they ate some of our primitive ancestors as food! They flew back to what looks to be Dark Bramble before it overgrew.
ShipLogDictionary.Slate wants me to investigate a strange: Slate wants me to investigate a strange signal.
ShipLogDictionary.Slate sounded horrified when I told them: Slate sounded horrified when I told them about our kind being eaten by the three inhabitants that visited. I think they've gone vegan!
ShipLogDictionary.Orbiting the crimson gas giant is a volc: Orbiting the crimson gas giant is a volcanic moon. Could there perhaps be something on it?
ShipLogDictionary.Burning Bombardier is Velvet Vortex's vo: Burning Bombardier is Velvet Vortex's volcanic moon.
ShipLogDictionary.If you reach a low enough elevation, you: If you reach a low enough elevation, you will start taking heat damage.
ShipLogDictionary.Pine said there was a base somewhere on: Pine said there was a base somewhere on Velvet Vortex's Moon.
ShipLogDictionary.There is a base wedged in between two vo: There is a base wedged in between two volcanoes on Burning Bombardier.
ShipLogDictionary.The Strangers' Inhabitants founded a Min: The Strangers' Inhabitants founded a Ministry of Defense in response to "anomalies" like one that just happened.
ShipLogDictionary.The Inhabitants claimed they have made s: The Inhabitants claimed they have made several nuclear warheads for "Operation Phoenix".
ShipLogDictionary.An anomaly from Dark Bramble caused pani: An anomaly from Dark Bramble caused panic within the system, several inhabitants fearing another loss of their homeworld.
ShipLogDictionary.A clock in the military base shows every: A clock in the military base shows every 11 minutes with a symbol.
ShipLogDictionary.The text here says the desert planet wil: The text here says the desert planet will lose its atmosphere at "star time".
ShipLogDictionary.This text here mentions a \"seal\", and: This text here mentions a "seal", and it will be burned by lava at "ring time".
ShipLogDictionary.On the Ringed Giant, I saw an abandoned: On the Ringed Giant, I saw an abandoned structure. On one of the slots it had a picture of a VOLCANO gas giant.
ShipLogDictionary.I found a square piece of metal in one o: I found a square piece of metal in one of the volcanoes. It looks like it fits in the structure...

tsta_thevision.Name: The Vision
tsta_thevision.Description: Use the Vision Torch on Solanum.

tsta_mindscapes.Name: Mindscapes
tsta_mindscapes.Description: Use the Vision Torch on Slate.

tsta_ghostbusters.Name: Ghostbuster
tsta_ghostbusters.Description: Remove all of the simulation's residents.

tsta_followyourdreams.Name: Follow Your Dreams
tsta_followyourdreams.Description: Reach a certain planet before learning the Strangers' Language.

tsta_allornothing.Name: All or Nothing
tsta_allornothing.Description: Get all five seals in a single loop.
